markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Phase Familiar](/Spells.aspx?ID=1884)
<actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Hex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=324" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=734" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 385 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

 

**Trigger** Your familiar would take damage

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 60 feet

**Target** your familiar
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Your patron momentarily recalls your familiar to the ether, shifting it from its solid, physical form into a ghostly version of itself. Against the triggering damage, your familiar gains resistance 5 to all damage and is immune to precision damage.

---
**Heightened (+1)** Increase the resistance by 2.
name: Phase Familiar
